Content.Text:
<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome! Just give me a minute, I'll be right
with you.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh! It's you, <MYNAME>. Perfect timing.
<PAGE>
I just finished baking a cake. Come on back and
I'll give you a slice!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Come on, <MYNAME>. Take a seat and give it a
taste.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Go on! Dig in! ♪

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wellllll? This is the first time I've baked this cake,
so you're my unofficial taste-tester!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Er, well, It's not something TOTALLY new,
though. I just tweaked my usual recipe a bit.
<PAGE>
So what do you think? Come on and tell me, I
can take it!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well? It wasn't too sweet, was it?
Yep. It was too sweet.
Not at all.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You thought so too? Let me see...

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? It wasn't? Let me see...

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, okay.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, maybe it could use a bit more lemon...
What do you think? Is it too tart?
Yeah, try adding more lemon.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, and it wasn't too firm, was it?
Yeah, it was pretty firm.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
And the whipped cream...there wasn't too
much, was there?
Yeah, there was a bit much.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see, I see. Well then!

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey there, <MYNAME>! I didn't know you were
here. Kick back and relax all you'd like, okay?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! Hi Gunther. What's going on?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nothing much. Just didn't have the right tools
with me at the job site, so I came home to grab
'em. Gotta head right back.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>What's this? Did you go and make another cake
again?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Sure did! I made some tweaks from my last
attempt. How about it? Want to try a slice?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nah, not right now. I'm still on the job. And so
are you. You oughta be out at the counter,
y'know.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, don't be such a worrywart! If a customer
comes in, I'll go right out to them. Right,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Looks like she dragged you into taste-testing,
didn't she, <MYNAME>? Just remember, you
don't have to eat it just to be nice.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey now! You're making it sound like I forced
<MYNAME> to eat it! Isn't that right,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nothin' wrong with making cakes for people, but
if you keep eating them too, you're gonna gain
weight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>Oh, come on now! A little cake here and there
isn't going to turn me into some giant
marshmallow!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Well, maybe it's just me, but you've been looking
a little rounder in the waist lately.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>What? I do?! Hold on a minute. Let's get a
second opinion from <MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, do I look like I'm getting fat?
Yes.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Wh-what? You think so too? Oh no!
<PAGE>
Maybe I should stop baking cakes for a while.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nah. Go on and keep making 'em if you want.
Just don't eat too much of 'em yourself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>But if I don't taste them, how will I know if you'll
like them?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Don't you worry about that. I've yet to see you
make a bad cake.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You think so? Well that makes me feel good! ♪

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can't be having an easy time either, eh
<MYNAME>? Well, she's not that much pudgier,
and with your work, I doubt you'll be either.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Still, I guess I could cut down on the number of
cakes I make. Too many sweets tends to give
me heartburn these days.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! Just realized I'm still on the clock! I'd better
get back to work. See ya!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
And I suppose I'd best get back to the shop.
Thank you for indulging my taste-testing ways,
<MYNAME>.
